resources.string: I developed this application to allow people to easily browse through different life categories and discover new things. All information found in this application comes from thousands of source files that were batch processed using scripts I wrote. While the source files from the BBC Wildlife Ontology Project may be error-free, errors or exceptions may have occured while batch processing these files to extract information. Therefore, I cannot guarantee that data from this application is fully correct. The user is solely responsible for reviewing and evaluating the accuracy and relevance of any information received through this application.

All data used in this application comes from the BBC Wildlife Ontology project(http://www.bbc.co.uk/ontologies/wo) which is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution License(http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/1.0#id).This copyright applies to the Wildlife Ontology and accompanying documentation in RDF, an open Web standard. As per the license, modifications should be published. You can find all changes change to the source files on THIS.
